alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 3:06PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 or more inches possible. Highest accumulations will be across the high terrain and north of the Route 2 corridor. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, eastern, northeastern and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. Impacts from accumulating snow will start after the Friday evening commute, with no impact to the commute expected. The most significant period of accumulating snow will be between midnight and 9 AM Saturday, with lingering snow possible through Saturday afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult lat Friday night and Saturday morning even on pretreated surfaces. Travel should be avoided unless necessary.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
